alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 12:00AM CDT until August 09 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR EASTERN FILLMORE AND NORTHEASTERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 1159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Exeter to near Milligan to near Hebron, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hebron, Exeter, Fairmont, Milligan, Bruning, Alexandria, Ohiowa, Belvidere, Gilead and Strang. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
